amendatorysection.catchline: District; organization; amendment of charter; petition.
amendatorysection.para: A district may be organized and may amend its charter under Chapter 70, article 6, by filing in the office of the Nebraska Power Review Board a petition in compliance with requirements set forth in Chapter 70, article 6, and receiving the approval of the petition by the Nebraska Power Review Board.

annotation.para: Initial step toward the organization of a district is the filing of a petition. Schroll v. City of Beatrice, 169 Neb. 162, 98 N.W.2d 790 (1959).
